name: CodingKey
desc: A type that can be used as a key for encoding and decoding.

items.name: init?(intValue: Int)
items.desc: Creates a new instance from the specified integer.

items.name: init?(stringValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance from the given string.

items.name: var intValue: Int?
items.desc: The value to use in an integer-indexed collection (e.g. an int-keyed dictionary).

items.name: var stringValue: String
items.desc: The string to use in a named collection (e.g. a string-keyed dictionary).
